features: Product 1: 3-in-1 CAR SEAT: Rear-facing with harness: 5-40 lb; forward-facing with harness: 22-65 lb; and forward-facing booster: 40-100 lb
Product 1: HAPPY PLANET COLLECTION: Fabrics made with recycled materials as part of our Do More promise to Recycle, Reimagine, and Give Back
Product 1: SLIM, SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: It's a back seat space savior
Product 1: NO STRAP STRUGGLE: No-rethread harness system; one-hand, 6-position headrest and harness adjust together
Product 2: KEEP IT LIGHT: This ultra-lightweight infant car seat weighs in at just under 7 lb
Product 2: HAPPY PLANET COLLECTION: Fabrics made with recycled materials as part of our Do More promise to Recycle, Reimagine, and Give Back
Product 2: REAR-FACING FOR LITTLES FROM 4-35 LB: Just the right size for your baby bear
Product 2: KEEPSAFE PROTECTION: Designed and tested to help provide safe and secure protection so you can focus on the road ahead
body.description: Century Drive On 3-in-1 Car Seat – All-in-One Car Seat for Kids 5-100 lb, SplashFinally, something your kiddo won't outgrow so fast—we're looking at you, newborn onesies. Listen, growing up happens, and your little needs to be safe and secure every step of the way. Enter the Century® Drive On™ 3-in-1 Car Seat, nicknamed "The Fantastic Fit" for its clever, streamlined design. Part of our Happy Planet Collection, this car seat is made with fabrics made from recycled materials. That's part of our Do More™ promise to Recycle, Reimagine, and Give Back. With 3 modes of use for kids 5-100 lb, it grows as your mini does. Also awesome: Its slim design saves precious back seat space, so there's plenty of room for everyone else. And how about this? A no-rethread harness system means no strap struggle when it's time to adjust. The one-hand adjustment leaves one hand to pull snug and one hand for baby—makes sense, right? Century® KeepSafe™ means this seat is designed and tested to help provide safe and secure protection so you can focus on the road ahead.Century Carry On 35 Lightweight Infant Car Seat, MetroOK, so let's talk car seats. You're gonna need one to get your little baby bean home. And, of course, it's got to be packed with safety features. Oh, and comfy, too. And can we not with the bulky, heavy design? Ta-da! We used a little car seat magic (and a lot of testing), and in this corner, weighing in at just under 7 lb, let's give it up for the Carry On™ 35 Lightweight Infant Car Seat, a.k.a "The Weightless Wonder". Sized for littles from 4-35 lb to ride rear-facing, the Century® Carry On™ 35 Lightweight Infant Car Seat is part of our Happy Planet Collection, with fabrics made from recycled materials. That's part of our Do More™ promise to Recycle, Reimagine, and Give Back. And, Century® KeepSafe™ means this sleek and comfy seat is designed and tested to help provide safe and secure protection so you can focus on the road ahead.

Everything You Need KeepSafe Protection Our car seats have KeepSafe Protection to meet or exceed US FMVSS 213 safety standards for crash protection. Installation Made Easy Installs with the vehicle seat belt or LATCH: Whatever is the easiest and best install for you!
